s9.message: Changed example exception rule to {1} (@@https:// sometimes whitelists pages containing ads)

s8.message: Made links in the German locale point to the German version of adblockplus.mozdev.org

s2.message: Fixed issues with configurable shortcut keys on Mac OS X (Tab key would trigger an Adblock Plus action)

s7.message: Added subscription recommendation for the Russian region

s5.message: Hiding "Block images from ..." in the context menu (image manager's entry) to avoid confusion — unless image manager is already blocking something or extensions.adblockplus.hideimagemanager is

s4.message: Moved Tools menu entry to a more suitable location
